nodes.text: The Rock Rogues was a pirate group that operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

In about 32 BBY, the Rock Rogues entered a partnership with the Syndicate, a criminal organization that was led by the Human Alina Impeveri. The Rogues would attack Metatheran Cartel merchant ships just outside the Cularin system, then seize their cargo and take it to the Syndicate's base of operations, in the Ishkik caverns on the planet Cularin. However, the Heroes of Cularin traveled to the caverns and attacked the Syndicate and the Rogues, stopping their operation in the Cularin system.
